Interface IExecutor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FaultAcceptable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllSharingBatchExecutor, AllSharingStremingExecutor, BatchSharingExecutor, BatchSharingExecutor2, DedicatedComStreamingExecutor, DedidatedBatchExecutor, StreamingAllSharingExecutor, StreamingAllSharingExecutor2, StreamingSharingExecutor, ThreadSharingExecutor

    public interface IExecutor
extends FaultAcceptable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      ExecutionPlan getExecutionPlan()
      Get the execution plan associated with this executor
      IExecution iExecute()
      Asynchronously execute a plan, One need to call progress on the execution object returned to continue the execution
      default void onFault(Fault fault)
      We are notifying that there is an error in the system and we need to terminate the current execution.

      • onFault

        default void onFault(Fault fault)
              throws Twister2Exception
        We are notifying that there is an error in the system and we need to terminate the current execution.
        Specified by:
        onFault in interface FaultAcceptable
        Parameters:
        fault - the error code
        Throws:
        Twister2Exception - if an exception occurs while processing the fault
